can_do: I can support arguments and construct hypotheses with increased detail.
prompt:
Language: Spanish (es)
Level: Advanced Mid (AM)
Can-Do Statement: "I can support arguments and construct hypotheses with increased detail."

ACTFL Advanced Mid "Can-Do" → I can support arguments and construct hypotheses with increased detail.

Generate 6 topical lessons focused on this Can-Do statement. Each lesson should:
- Have 8-12 flashcards 
- Use 85% high-frequency words (top 4,000), 15% function words
- Include practical, culturally relevant examples
- Provide an IPA pronunciation for each word
- Include a example sentence for each vocabulary word

Your JSON output must validate against the given schema. Format each lesson
as a distinct unit with a clear objective that builds toward the Can-Do goal.

response:
```json
{
  "level_code": "AM",
  "topic_slug": "argumentacion-hipotesis",
  "topic_title": "Argumentación e Hipótesis",
  "can_do_statement": "I can support arguments and construct hypotheses with increased detail.",
  "lessons": [
    {
      "slug": "introduccion-al-debate",
      "title": "Introducción al Debate: Expresar Opiniones",
      "objective": "Learners will be able to express opinions and provide basic supporting reasons in a debate setting.",
      "cards": [
        {
          "front": "En mi opinión",
          "back": "In my opinion",
          "ipa": "/en mi o.pi.ˈnjon/",
          "example_sentence": "En mi opinión, la energía renovable es el futuro.",
          "grammar_explanation": "Common phrase to introduce an opinion."
        },
        {
          "front": "Creo que",
          "back": "I believe that",
          "ipa": "/ˈkɾe.o ke/",
          "example_sentence": "Creo que deberíamos invertir más en educación.",
          "grammar_explanation": "Followed by a clause expressing a belief."
        },
        {
          "front": "Pienso que",
          "back": "I think that",
          "ipa": "/ˈpjen.so ke/",
          "example_sentence": "Pienso que es importante considerar todas las opciones.",

        {
          "front": "Por ejemplo",
          "back": "For example",
          "ipa": "/poɾ e.ˈxem.plo/",

          "grammar_explanation": "Introduces a specific instance."

          "front": "Además",
          "back": "Furthermore/In addition",

          "back": "Because",

    {
      "slug": "expresando-acuerdo-desacuerdo",
      "title": "Expresando Acuerdo y Desacuerdo",
      "objective": "Learners will be able to express agreement and disagreement with arguments and offer counterarguments.",
      "cards": [
        {
          "front": "Estoy de acuerdo",
          "back": "I agree",

        {

          "back": "I disagree",

        {

        {

        {

        },
        {
          "front": "Tal vez",

          "ipa": "/tal ˈβes/",

        },
        {

          "ipa": "/a lo me.ˈxoɾ/",

        {
          "front": "Es probable que",

          "grammar_explanation": "Expresses a high degree of probability."

        {

        {

    {
      "slug": "analizando-causa-efecto",
```
